title: New Fanfiction

embed.description: Chapter I Disclaimer: I do not own the rights to the characters nor the basic plot expressed in this story. The characters belong to Riot games, and the basic plot belongs to Hooreng, who generously allowed me to write this story. Reviews and comments will be greatly appreciated.

body: hey guys. I recently started writing a fanfiction called Parallel Log. I got the basic plot from a artist named Hooreng (@hooreng on twitter). The plot was he wanted Ahri to be a character created by an experiment and LeBlanc is raising her as a child. I would really appreciate it if you guys can give it a read and a review. Thank you!
